articles.title: US to announce new sanction package on Russia on Wednesday - CNN
articles.description: The US will announce new sanctions on Russia Wednesday in coordination with Group of 7 nations and the European Union, according to an administration official.

articles.author: Anna Cooban, CNN Business
articles.title: Europe is finally coming after Russia's energy - CNN
articles.description: European leaders have planned to phase out Russian coal imports in response to harrowing scenes in Bucha, a suburb of Kyiv.
